label: Business Hallmark
title: Business_Hallmark
exrest: Business Hallmark is published in Lagos, Nigeria and its website, hallmarknews.com specializes in business, policy and finance related articles. The site went live in March 2009 offering a mix of business related and general interest articles. It enjoyed keen readership in business communities and amongst tertiary institutions, owing to the varied information on business, policy and finance, available on the website. The strength of the newspaper was on well-researched editorial contents fused with statistical facts.
